refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: X = gf_linsolve('gmres',Spmat M, vec b[, int restart][, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) X = gf_linsolve('cg',Spmat M, vec b [, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) X = gf_linsolve('bicgstab',Spmat M, vec b [, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) [U, cond] = gf_linsolve('lu',Spmat M, vec b) [U, cond] = gf_linsolve('superlu',Spmat M, vec b)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: * X = gf_linsolve('gmres',Spmat M, vec b[, int restart][, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) Solve `M.X = b` with the generalized minimum residuals method. Optionally using `P` as preconditioner. The default value of the restart parameter is 50.
* X = gf_linsolve('cg',Spmat M, vec b [, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) Solve `M.X = b` with the conjugated gradient method. Optionally using `P` as preconditioner.

* X = gf_linsolve('bicgstab',Spmat M, vec b [, Precond P][,'noisy'][,'res', r][,'maxiter', n]) Solve `M.X = b` with the bi-conjugated gradient stabilized method. Optionally using `P` as a preconditioner.
